headline: Change Foods Secures Funding for Animal-Free Dairy
summary: Change Foods receives investment to scale up its precision-fermentation process for creating dairy alternatives.

headline: Modern Synthesis Raises $4.1M To Scale Microbial Textile Platform
summary: Modern Synthesis gets funding to expand its microbial textile production, offering leather and plastic alternatives.

headline: Solar Foods Announces Commercial Launch of Solein in Singapore
summary: Solar Foods begins selling its air-based protein, Solein, marking a milestone for gas-fermentation-derived foods.

headline: Algiknit Partners with Fashion Brands to Develop Algae-Based Yarns
summary: Algiknit collaborates with apparel companies on algae-derived yarns as a sustainable textile alternative.

headline: Formo Gains Regulatory Approval for Precision-Fermented Cheese in Europe
summary: Formo secures regulatory clearance to sell its animal-free cheese made via precision fermentation in Europe.

headline: MycoWorks Announces New Production Facility for Reishi
summary: MycoWorks expands its manufacturing capacity for Reishi, its mushroom-based leather alternative.

headline: Perfect Day Launches New Line of Animal-Free Ice Cream
summary: Perfect Day releases a new line of ice cream made with their precision-fermented whey protein.

headline: BioMason Partners with Construction Firm to Pilot Biocement Bricks
summary: BioMason teams up to test its biocement bricks, an environmentally friendly alternative to traditional concrete.

headline: Air Protein Achieves Breakthrough in CO2 Conversion Efficiency
summary: Air Protein reports a major advancement in the efficiency of converting CO2 into edible protein.

headline: Checkerspot Develops New High-Performance Algae-Based Polyurethane
summary: Checkerspot unveils a novel polyurethane material derived from algae oil, targeting various applications.
